product_overview: GTMwithFerm is a professional portfolio website showcasing Fermin Andujar's expertise as a go-to-market engineer. The platform highlights GTM systems, automation playbooks, certifications, and professional services to attract clients and demonstrate technical capabilities.
core_goals: Generate leads through contact form submissions and meeting bookings.
Establish Fermin Andujar as a credible expert in go-to-market engineering and automation.
Effectively showcase certification achievements and project work.
Provide a performant, accessible, and SEO-optimized user experience.
Maintain a modern, maintainable, and visually engaging web platform.
key_features: Homepage with hero section featuring rotating text animation and featured projects showcase.
About page displaying personal background, tool stack, skills visualization, and resume download.
Contact page with form inputs, direct contact info, social media links, and Calendly integration.
Projects showcase with project cards displaying images, descriptions, and certification badges.
Services page with clearly described service cards and call-to-action to contact.
Responsive header navigation with mobile menu and sticky features.
Footer with site info, social links, legal links, and responsiveness.
Smooth rotating text animation with configurable interval and accessibility support.
Accessible project cards with hover effects and link placeholders for future detail pages.
Consistent, accessible CTA buttons across the site.
Typed content management ensuring separation of content and presentation.
user_flow_summary: User lands on homepage, experiences animated hero with rotating text, browses featured projects, and uses CTA to navigate to contact or projects page.
User navigates to About page to learn about Fermin's background, skills, and downloads the resume.
User accesses Contact page to fill and submit the contact form, or use direct email, phone links, or schedule meetings via Calendly widget.
User views Projects showcase page, browsing project cards with filtering and tags (future enhancement).
User explores Services page to understand consulting offerings and uses CTAs to proceed to contact.
Users interact with responsive navigation on desktop or mobile, with smooth menu toggling.
Users engage with interactive components like rotating text and smooth hover effects on project cards.
validation_criteria: All core pages (Homepage, About, Contact, Projects, Services) are fully functional and accessible.
Contact form validates input and provides user feedback on submission.
Animations including rotating text are performant, smooth, and respect reduced motion preferences.
Site achieves performance metrics: LCP < 2.5s, FID < 100ms, CLS < 0.1, and Lighthouse score > 90.
Pages meet WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility standards with keyboard and screen reader support.
Navigation menus and CTAs function correctly across screen sizes and devices.
Content updates are manageable through typed content files without code changes.
SEO best practices are implemented including meta tags, structured data, and sitemap.
Cross-browser testing confirms support for latest versions of major browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge.
Responsive design works seamlessly across mobile, tablet, and desktop breakpoints.
